content: Back at the Towers of Karma Shrine, look ahead to find a large series of statues carved into a wall with a new enemy standing in front of them. This fearsome foe is a Dual-Blade Monk, and has a lot of health and damaging moves (but thankfully won't respawn).
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Towers of Karma' and the sub-subsection 'The Treasure Hunter's Quest - Continued'.
The content is as follows:
Back at the Towers of Karma Shrine, look ahead to find a large series of statues carved into a wall with a new enemy standing in front of them. This fearsome foe is a Dual-Blade Monk, and has a lot of health and damaging moves (but thankfully won't respawn).
